biography: Marissa Ribisi was born on December 17, 1974 in Los Angeles, California,  USA as Santina Marissa Ribisi. She is an actress and writer, known for Dazed and Confused (1993), Pleasantville (1998) and 100 Girls (2000). She has been married to Beck since April 3, 2004. They have two children.
name: Marissa Ribisi
